results.title: Advanced science: isotopes
results.brief_description: This film describes the nature and production of isotopes; radio-active isotopes and their use in industry and medicine. Shows natural uranium being separated into isotopes; uses lithium as an example to explain the meaning of isotopes; history of their discovery; methods of separating isotopes, and the making of radio-isotopes and their uses are illustrated.

results.title: Adriana Lecouvreur
results.creator_credit: Opera Australia, ABC-TV (Australia), John Copley and Hugh Davidson
results.brief_description: Recorded live at the Sydney Opera House on 18 February 1984 this performance of Francesco Cilea’s ” Adriana Lecouvreur” features the grand voice of Dame Joan Sutherland, along with John Shaw, Anson Austin and Heather Begg, The Australian Opera Chorus and The Elizabethan Sydney Orchestra conducted by Richard Bonynge. Set in four acts, it tells the tragic story of a Parisian actress, Adriana Lecouvreur. “This is an excellently sung, played and staged production of this lovely, lyrical opera”…(The Canberra Times). Sung in Italian with English subtitles.

results.title: Adorable Menteuse = Such an Adorable Liar
results.brief_description:
Juliette and Sophie share an apartment. Juliette is a garrulous 18-year-old girl who can’t go five minutes without telling a lie. She spies on her upstairs neighbour, a man of 40, pretending she is in love with him … until the day she really is. She vows to reform and speak nothing but the truth. But her reputation precedes her and her gentleman friend refuses to take anything she says seriously.

Credits: Producer, Philippe Dussart ; director, Michel Deville ; writers, Nina Companeez, Michel Deville ; photography, Claude Lecomte ; music, Jean Dalve.
Cast: Marina Vlady, Macha Meril, Ginette Letondal, Jean-Marc Bory, Michel Vitold, Jean-Francois Calve, Claude Nicot, Michel Lonsdale, Christian Alers.

results.title: Adoption: children are waiting
results.creator_credit: Westminster Films, ONF | NFB, Lee Gordon and Laurie Jennings
results.brief_description: This film will inform and encourage prospective adopting parents and be helpful to professionals in the child-welfare field. In interviews, three couples relate their experiences of adopting older or handicapped children. A fourth couple explains how they, as foster parents, try to prepare children emotionally for adoption.

results.title: Adolescence: a case study
results.brief_description: A study of adolescence as a time of change. Explores the life of Angie, a 17 year old high school student. Shows her at home, at school and with friends. Dr John Flavell talks about Piaget’s concept of “formal operations” and explains mental development in adolescence.
